mapper.select:
SELECT Distinct1.C1 C1, Distinct1.STK_ID STK_ID, Distinct1.STK_CODE STK_CODE, Distinct1.STK_DESC STK_DESC, Distinct1.SERIAL_CHK, Distinct1.SRV_FILTER_ID, Distinct1.SRV_CONFIG_ID, Distinct1.SRV_FILTER_LAST_SERIAL OLD_SERIAL_NO, Distinct1.SERIAL_NO, Distinct1.SS_RESULT_ID, Distinct1.SS_RESULT_ITM_ID, TO_CHAR(Distinct1.SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT, Distinct1.SRV_FILTER_PRIOD FROM ( SELECT Extent1.SRV_SO_ID SRV_SO_ID, Extent2.SRV_FILTER_STK_ID SRV_FILTER_STK_ID, Extent2.SRV_FILTER_ID, Extent1.SRV_CONFIG_ID, Extent2.SRV_FILTER_LAST_SERIAL, Extent3.STK_ID STK_ID, Extent3.STK_CODE STK_CODE, Extent3.STK_DESC STK_DESC, Extent3.SERIAL_CHK, 1 C1 , Extent5.SS_RESULT_ID, Extent6.SS_RESULT_ITM_ID, Extent6.FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO SERIAL_NO, Extent2.SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT, Extent2.SRV_FILTER_PRIOD FROM SAL0090D Extent1 JOIN SAL0087D Extent2 ON Extent1.SRV_CONFIG_ID = Extent2.SRV_CONFIG_ID JOIN SYS0026M Extent3 ON Extent2.SRV_FILTER_STK_ID = Extent3.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0008D Extent4 ON Extent1.SRV_SO_ID = Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0144M Extent5 ON Extent4.SCHDUL_ID = Extent5.SCHDUL_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0145D Extent6 ON Extent5.SS_RESULT_ID = Extent6.SS_RESULT_ID AND Extent6.SS_RESULT_PART_ID = Extent2.SRV_FILTER_STK_ID
WHERE 1 = Extent1.SRV_STUS_ID AND Extent1.SRV_SO_ID = #{salesOrdId} AND Extent4.SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId} AND Extent2.SRV_FILTER_STUS_ID = 1
AND Extent1.SRV_TYPE = 'SS' AND ADD_MONTHS(FN_GET_FIRST_DAY_MONTH(Extent2.SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT), Extent2.SRV_FILTER_PRIOD) <= SYSDATE
) Distinct1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SVC0144M ( SS_RESULT_ID , SCHDUL_ID , SALES_ORD_ID , SS_RESULT_STUS_CODE_ID , SS_FAIL_RESN_ID , SS_RESULT_REM , SS_RESULT_CRT_USER_ID , SS_RESULT_CRT_DT , SS_RESULT_UPD_USER_ID , SS_RESULT_UPD_DT, SS_SHIPMENT_NO , SRV_PREV_DT ) VALUES ( #{ssResultId} , #{schdulId} , #{salesOrdId} , 1 , 0 , #{remark} , #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE , #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE, #{serviceNo}, #{srvPrevDt} )

INSERT INTO SVC0145D ( SS_RESULT_ITM_ID , SS_RESULT_ID , SS_RESULT_PART_ID , SS_RESULT_PART_DESC , SS_RESULT_PART_QTY , SS_RESULT_REM , SS_RESULT_CRT_DT , SS_RESULT_CRT_USER_ID , SS_RESULT_UPD_DT , SS_RESULT_UPD_USER_ID , FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO, OLD_FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO, SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ssResultItmId} , #{ssResultId} , #{stkId} , #{stkDesc} , NVL(#{qty},1) , #{remark} , SYSDATE , #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE , #{crtUsrId} , #{serialNo} , #{oldSerialNo}, #{srvFilterPrvChgDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT Extent3.NO HS_NO, Extent1.FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO SERIAL_NO FROM SVC0145D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SVC0144M Extent2 ON Extent1.SS_RESULT_ID = Extent2.SS_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0008D Extent3 ON Extent2.SCHDUL_ID = Extent3.SCHDUL_ID WHERE Extent2.SS_RESULT_STUS_CODE_ID NOT IN (21,10) AND Extent1.FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo} AND Extent3.TYPE_ID = 7660

SELECT Extent1.SS_RESULT_ID , Extent1.SCHDUL_ID , Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID , Extent1.SS_SHIPMENT_NO , Extent1.SS_DELIVRY_STUS_ID , Extent2.CODE_NAME AS SS_DELIVRY_STUS , TO_CHAR(Extent1.SS_DELIVRY_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS SS_DELIVRY_DT, Extent3.SS_RTN_NO, Extent4.SRV_CONFIG_ID FROM SVC0144M Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent1.SS_DELIVRY_STUS_ID = Extent2.CODE AND Extent2.CODE_MASTER_ID = 585 LEFT JOIN SVC0146M Extent3 ON Extent1.SCHDUL_ID = Extent3.SS_REF_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0090D Extent4 ON Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent4.SRV_SO_ID AND Extent4.SRV_STUS_ID = 1 WHERE Extent1.SS_RESULT_ID = #{ssResultId} AND Extent1.SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId} AND Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrderId}

SELECT DELVY_REF_ID , DELVY_TRKNO , DELVY_SEQ , Extent2.CODE_NAME AS DELVY_STUS , TO_CHAR(DELVY_DT , 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DELVY_DT , DELVY_LOC , DELVY_RMK FROM SVC0143D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0013M Extent2 ON Extent1.DELVY_SEQ = Extent2.CODE AND Extent2.CODE_MASTER_ID = 585 WHERE Extent1.DELVY_REF_ID = #{schdulId} AND DEL_FLG = 'N' ORDER BY DELVY_ID DESC

SELECT Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID, Extent4.STK_ID STK_ID, Extent4.STK_CODE ITEM_CODE, Extent4.STK_DESC ITEM_DESC, Extent4.SERIAL_CHK, Extent3.SS_RESULT_PART_QTY AS QUANTITY, Extent3.FILTER_BARCD_SERIAL_NO SERIAL_NO, Extent3.SS_RESULT_ID, Extent3.SS_RESULT_ITM_ID, Extent5.SS_RTN_NO , Extent6.SS_RTN_ITM_ID , CASE WHEN Extent6.SS_RTN_GDS != 0 THEN Extent6.SS_RTN_GDS ELSE 0 END AS TOT_GOOD_COND, CASE WHEN Extent6.SS_RTN_BAD_GDS != 0 THEN Extent6.SS_RTN_BAD_GDS ELSE 0 END AS TOT_DEFECT_COND, CASE WHEN Extent6.SS_RTN_MISS_GDS !=0 THEN Extent6.SS_RTN_MISS_GDS ELSE 0 END AS TOT_MIA_COND FROM SVC0008D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SVC0144M Extent2 ON Extent1.SCHDUL_ID = Extent2.SCHDUL_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0145D Extent3 ON Extent2.SS_RESULT_ID = Extent3.SS_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0026M Extent4 ON Extent3.SS_RESULT_PART_ID = Extent4.STK_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0146M Extent5 ON Extent1.SCHDUL_ID = Extent5.SS_REF_ID LEFT JOIN SVC0147D Extent6 ON Extent5.SS_RTN_ID = Extent6.SS_RTN_ID AND Extent3.SS_RESULT_PART_ID = Extent6.SS_STK_ID AND Extent6.DEL_FLG = 'N' WHERE Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID = #{salesOrdId} AND Extent1.SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId} AND Extent2.SS_RESULT_ID = #{ssResultId}

SELECT C.STK_ID AS ITEM_CODE, C.STK_DESC AS ITEM_DESC, F.SS_RESULT_PART_QTY AS QUANTITY, A.SS_RTN_GDS AS TOT_GOOD_COND, A.SS_RTN_BAD_GDS AS TOT_DEFECT_COND, A.SS_RTN_MISS_GDS AS TOT_MIA_COND FROM SVC0147D A JOIN SVC0146M B ON A.SS_RTN_ID = B.SS_RTN_ID AND B.DEL_FLG = 'N' JOIN SYS0026M C ON A.SS_STK_ID = C.STK_ID JOIN SVC0144M D ON B.SS_REF_ID = D.SCHDUL_ID JOIN SVC0008D E ON D.SCHDUL_ID = E.SCHDUL_ID JOIN SVC0145D F ON D.SS_RESULT_ID = F.SS_RESULT_ID AND F.SS_RESULT_PART_ID = A.SS_STK_ID WHERE A.DEL_FLG = 'N' AND B.SS_REF_ID = #{schdulId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SVC0146M ( SS_RTN_ID , SS_RTN_NO , SS_RTN_TYP_ID , SS_REF_ID , SS_RTN_STAT , DEL_FLG , CRT_USR_ID , CRT_DT , UPD_USR_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{ssRtnId} , #{ssRtnNo} , 296 , #{schdulId} , 1 , 'N', #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE , #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO SVC0147D ( SS_RTN_ITM_ID , SS_RTN_ID , SS_STK_ID , SS_RTN_GDS , SS_RTN_BAD_GDS , SS_RTN_MISS_GDS , DEL_FLG , CRT_USR_ID , CRT_DT , UPD_USR_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{ssRtnItmId} , #{ssRtnId} , #{stkId} , #{totGoodCond} , #{totDefectCond} , #{totMiaCond} , 'N', #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE , #{crtUsrId} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT LISTAGG(B.STK_CODE|| '-' || A.SS_RESULT_PART_QTY, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.SS_RESULT_ID) AS ITM_LIST FROM SVC0145D A LEFT JOIN SYS0026M B ON A.SS_RESULT_PART_ID = B.STK_ID WHERE A.SS_RESULT_ID = #{ssResultId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SVC0006D SET RESULT_STUS_CODE_ID = #{ssStusId}, RESULT_REM = #{ssRemark}, FAIL_RESN_ID = #{ssFailReason}, RESULT_UPD_DT = SYSDATE , RESULT_UPD_USER_ID = #{updUsrId} WHERE SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId}

UPDATE SAL0090D SET SRV_PREV_DT = (SELECT SRV_PREV_DT FROM SVC0144M WHERE SS_RESULT_ID = #{ssResultId}), SRV_UPD_USER_ID = #{updUsrId}, SRV_UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SRV_CONFIG_ID = #{srvConfigId} AND SRV_SO_ID = #{salesOrdId} AND SRV_STUS_ID = 1

UPDATE SAL0087D SET SRV_FILTER_PRV_CHG_DT = #{srvFilterPrvChgDt} , SRV_FILTER_EXPR_DT = ADD_MONTHS(SRV_FILTER_EXPR_DT , -SRV_FILTER_PRIOD) , SRV_FILTER_LAST_SERIAL = #{oldSerialNo} , SRV_FILTER_PREV_SERIAL = '', SRV_FILTER_CRT_USER_ID = #{updUsrId}, SRV_FILTER_UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SRV_CONFIG_ID = #{srvConfigId} AND SRV_FILTER_STK_ID = #{stkId} AND SRV_FILTER_STUS_ID = 1
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM SVC0008D A, SVC0144M B WHERE A.SCHDUL_ID = B.SCHDUL_ID AND A.NO = #{serviceNo}
SELECT Extent1.RESN_ID AS CODE_ID, Extent1.CODE || '-' || Extent1.RESN_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0032M Extent1 WHERE Extent1.RESN_TYPE_ID = 7692 AND Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 ORDER BY Extent1.CODE ASC
